# Working within columns 

The new `across` function supersedes functionalities of `_at`, `_if`, `_all` variants

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  summarize(across(starts_with("culmen"), mean, na.rm = TRUE),
            flipper_length_mean = mean(flipper_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE))
```
